title: Black Screen?
body: Alright, so my computer doesn't like to agree with League often. It tends to freeze a lot and slow down at random points, but I was playing around 3 minutes into a match when my screen froze. I could still use the cursor, but the screen was completely STILL for around ten minutes, then my computer crashed. Luckily, it saved the League tab and I loaded back into the match, only to have my screen be pitch black. I can also STILL use and move the cursor, but the screen is black now. Help? And is there any way to prevent this?

replies.body:
It sounds like League may be encountering some issues accessing or interacting with your display driver. There could be a few different reasons for this, so I'd like you to work through the steps in our [**Bugsplat & Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to work through the most common solutions.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not!
